mapper.insert: insert into hms_qna(member_id, nickname, title, content, response) values(#{memberId}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{response})
mapper.select:
select qna_id, member_id, nickname, title, content, response, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as created_date
from hms_qna
where title like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) or content like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by qna_id desc
select qna_id, member_id, nickname, title, content, response, created_date from hms_qna where qna_id=#{no}
